price: Ne ͻfrεfrεni a ͻfrε (amanfoͻ) kͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ wͻ N’akwamma mu, ne Kanea a εhyerεn.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
